```{r}
library(jsonlite)

s1 <- read_json("../../schema.json")
s2 <- read_json("../../ultra.json")
```

```{r}
fields <- s2$fields
```

```{r}
s1$fields <- c(s1$fields, fields)
```

```{r}
js <- toJSON(s1)
write(js, "../../schema-ultra.json")
```
